name: I Wanna Build A Spaceship
description:
Glorph wants to explore the stars, but he needs a spaceship! Help this lifeform solve 3 problems to get parts and blast off to one off to one of this game's 4 endings.

This is an entry for Sacramento Developer Collective's Voyager Jam.

Tools used:

  • RPG Maker MZ
  • MS Paint
  • GIMP
